name: Feel Good Farm
description:
Hello farmers!

This is an Alpha test of an idea I had for this "Feelgood" game-jam!

I did not have enough time to finish, but I'm proud of my work. I'm alone, and I had to work on other projects...

I did my best, and I'm proud to show you this "Gameplay test"

The principe is simple: You are a farmer, but you have to litterraly grow up you city.  You have to Grow up everything.

Roads, Rivers, etc..

I don't wan't to stop the project here, because I really enjoy it!

So, I'll had more block, better graphics, a shop to have more blocks, a tutorial, and I hope you will be intersted in this project and will Help me to improve it!

Don't hesitate to add screen of your city on my discord: https://discord.gg/RkPDQy6

See you soon ! :D
